title.rendered: Dera Ismail Khan Core Job August 2024

content.rendered:
Dera Ismail Khan Core Job August 2024. The Frontier Core South Khyber Pakhtunkhwa is hiring for a variety of positions. Matriculation candidates are welcome to apply. Candidates must be physically fit and capable of serving the nation. There are vacancies in the following positions.

By the terms and conditions of service, selected candidates will receive a competitive salary and other benefits. Transparency and fairness are hallmarks of the recruitment process.

Application forms should be submitted to the following address along with attested copies of educational certificates, domicile, CNIC, and a recent photograph. The minimum salary starts at 35000 rupees per month and rises to 46000 rupees per month.

Contact Us to Publish Your Jobs Ads At statesaga.com

Frontier Core Army jobs in Dera Ismail Khan 2024

Date Posted: 10 August, 2024
Last Date: 23 Oct, 2024
Category: Government
Newspaper: Jang Jobs
Education: Matric
Location: Dera Ismail Khan, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan
Organization: Frontier Core
Job Industry: Army Jobs
Job Type: Full Time

Latest Job In August 2024

  • Islamabad Exim Bank Job in 2024
  • NASTP Jobs in Islamabad, 2024
  • Job At Balochistan Wheels Limited In Karachi In August 2024

Frontier Constabulary FC, Pakistan Army, and Frontier Core are inviting applications for job vacancies as advertised in the daily Jang of 10 August 2024. In Dera Ismail Khan, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan, seven positions are currently available.

The candidates should have matriculation or equivalent education.

For Frontier Core’s latest government jobs, please submit your application by the closing date, around Oct 23, 2024, or as stated in the newspaper advertisement. Discover how to apply for Frontier Core’s latest job openings by viewing the complete Frontier Core job posting ad online.

FC’s Army Job Application Process

Learn about the application process for army jobs at FC, from submission requirements to selection procedures. Demonstrate your physical fitness, mental agility, and commitment to serving in the armed forces.
